content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” crypterium_vc_row_jarallax=”yes” el_id=”intro” p_img=”6591″ crypterium_vc_row_jarallax_speed=”0.3″][vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1620545737610{margin-top: 70px !important;margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”][vc_column]

Lux Trading Firm added for it’s elite traders in the trader dashboard the most powerful award-winning fusion of automated investment analytics & analyst research tool from Trading Central

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_video link=”https://youtu.be/qBt3nCmQzgo” css=”.vc_custom_1620542360973{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1620543195358{margin-top: 15px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Analyst Views provides a concise, actionable trading plan derived from the unique combination of registered market analysts and automated quantitative algorithms. With clear trend lines, unparalleled coverage and updated analyses published throughout the trading day, Analyst Views is a powerful tool for finding new trade ideas and timing your entry/exit points on all our platform 80 symbols and updated 6 x per day according to market changes in your dashboard.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1620545422894{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column]

Plug & Play MT4 indicator to back confident decisions. Get an instant viewpoint on our preferred direction along with target levels superimposed onto the charts of actively traded instruments!

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1620543214850{margin-top: 15px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_video link=”https://youtu.be/lmhupG4oR9c” align=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1620547928766{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”desktopview_none”][vc_column_text]

Leave the analysis to the experts and use the output of our analysis to craft your trades. Get an instant viewpoint on our preferred direction along with target levels. Discover our alternative scenario based on a pivot level where we would change our view and offer target levels in the opposite direction.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_video link=”https://youtu.be/lmhupG4oR9c” align=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1620547953005{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”mobileview_none”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1620545422894{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 70px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm”]

World’s favorite signals and pattern recognition meet the web's most beloved charting platform...

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1620543214850{margin-top: 15px !important;margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”6749″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1620989284987{padding-top: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text]TradingView and Trading Central have combined their cutting-edge technologies to modernize the digital charting experience by overlaying award winning insights and trade ideas directly onto real time charts. The integration of Trading Central’s Analyst Views and Technical Event LookUp® within TradingViews world-class HTML5 charts brings traders of all skill levels concise 24/7 analytics on global financial instruments.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1620487975040{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-color: #f9f9f9 !important;}” el_class=”timeLimit”][vc_column width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”6934″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”3/4″ css=”.vc_custom_1620991623555{margin-top: -90px !important;}” crypterium_vc_column_992=”.vc_custom_1620991623560{margin-top: 120px !important;}”]

Subscribe to TC Trade Levels of the Day email alerts

Get daily per email directional views from the global research desks of Trading Central!

[vc_raw_js][/vc_raw_js][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][vc_column][/vc_column][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]

With clear trend lines, unparalleled coverage and updated analyses published…
